subject: testing a MUltithreaded Code
msgSnippet: Hi, I am not very familiar with Junit.I have a question regrading testing multithreaded code I have the following method in a class public void
messageBody:
Hi,
I am not very familiar with Junit.I have a question regrading testing
multithreaded code
I have the following method in a class

public void dispatchCommand(final String[] args) {
String integrityCheckerId = args[0];
String integrityCheckerName = args[0];

IntegrityChecker integrityChecker = new IntegrityChecker
(this, integrityCheckerId, integrityCheckerName);

integrityChecker.start();

}

I need to unit test this method i.e I need to make sure that it has
infact started the integrityChecker thread . How do I do this since
the the object integrityChecker is local to this method.
Can anyone suggest something.
Mona
